text.section: Any authorized agency and insurer described in KRS 304.20-150 or 304.20-160 who receives any information furnished pursuant to KRS 304.20-160 to 304.20-190, shall hold the information in confidence until such time as its release is required pursuant to a criminal or civil proceeding.
Any authorized agency referred to in KRS 304.20-150, or their personnel, may be required to testify in any litigation in which the insurer at interest is named as a party.

law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
